articles.author: Adam Parsons
articles.title: Europe has stood firmly with Ukraine since the war began - but Italy's election and a tough winter could change things quickly - Sky News
articles.content:
The ripples of war spread fast. Over the course of the past six months, those ripples have travelled from Ukraine and affected politics around the world - but no more so than in Europe.

articles.author: Amitabh Sinha
articles.title: Explained: Europe’s great drought | Explained News - The Indian Express
articles.description: Legendary rivers have been reduced to shallow streams, hitting power generation. After the record-breaking summer heat, 2022 may be the worst drought year in Europe in 500 years. China, US too are facing drought
articles.content: European media has been full of dramatic pictures of drying, exposed riverbeds. Some of Europes biggest rivers Rhine, Po, Loire, Danube which are usually formidable waterways, are unable to support e… [+5684 chars]
